name: Visual Novel Maker - Visual Novel ME Perfect Collection
detailed_description:
Polish your end scenes and finish off your events in style with this well-produced pack of modern-sounding Music Events. Utilizing beautiful lush modern orchestral sounds, synthesizers and tonnes of variety, you will find lots of inspiring ideas for your end scenes. These short pieces range from 0:01 seconds to 0:09 and are fantastic ways to punctuate success or failure!

Features:

* 100 ME (Music Event)for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* ME for RPG fantasy and adventure and more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

VNMPC_ME001_Fanfare 1～9
VNMPC_ME010_Happy 1～7
VNMPC_ME017_Sleep 1～8
VNMPC_ME025_Horror 1～10
VNMPC_ME035_Comical 1～9
VNMPC_ME044_Mystery 1～10
VNMPC_ME054_Pleasure 1～6
VNMPC_ME060_Shock 1～4
VNMPC_ME064_Sad 1～3
VNMPC_ME067_Scary 1～4
VNMPC_ME071_Temptation 1～10
VNMPC_ME081_ItemGet 1～3
VNMPC_ME084_Inn 1～7
VNMPC_ME091_Find 1～3
VNMPC_ME094_Confusion 1～2
VNMPC_ME096_Save 1～5
